item.title: Quasar中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: 基于vuejs的开源前端框架，高性能，内置丰富的css和Vue 组件库，响应式支持，一套代码可以编译出SPA，PWA，SSR，手机应用和桌面应用。明智的人选择vue，高产的人选择quasar+vue。

item.author: null

item.title: 布局抽屉 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: 如何使用 QDrawer 组件。Quasar 的侧边栏。

item.title: Layout Page | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: How to use QPageContainer and QPage components. They define the contents of your Quasar app pages.

item.title: 布局模板 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: 在您的 Quasar 应用中开箱即用的布局模板

item.title: Layout QPageSticky | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: How to use the QPageSticky component. Statically place components on the layout without overlapping with header/footer/sidebars.

item.title: Layout QPageScroller | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: 如何使用 QPageScroller 组件。将用户滚动后屏幕上出现的组件放置在屏幕上。

item.title: Ajax Bar | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QAjaxBar 组件会在 Ajax 请求触发时展示一个加载进度条。

item.title: Avatar | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QAvatar Vue component creates an element that can embed a letter, an icon or an image within its shape.

item.title: Badge | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QBadge Vue component allows you to display information like contextual data that needs to stand out and get noticed.

item.title: Banner | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QBanner Vue component displays a prominent message and related optional actions.

item.title: Bar | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QBar Vue component is used to create the top bar on different platforms.

item.title: Breadcrumbs | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QBreadcrumbs Vue component is a navigational aid for your UI. It allows users to keep track of their location within programs, documents, or websites.

item.title: Button | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QBtn Vue component is a button with features like shaping, loading state, ripple and more.

item.title: Button Group | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QBtnGroup Vue component groups QBtn and QBtnDropdown into a single unit.

item.title: Dropdown Button | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QBtnDropdown Vue component is used to display dropdown content on a button.

item.title: Card | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QCard 是一个很棒的用于展示重要信息的 Vue 组件，它可以将信息聚合在卡片容器中展示，帮助用户更直观的获取信息。

item.title: Carousel | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QCarousel Vue 组件允许您使用幻灯片以更少的空间显示更多信息，对于创建向导或图库也很有用。

item.title: 聊天消息 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QChatMessage Vue 组件可以显示包含一个或多个用户消息的聊天条目。

item.title: Chip | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QChip Vue 组件基本上是一个简单的 UI 实体块，以紧凑的方式表示更复杂的数据，例如用来展示联系人。

item.title: 圆形进度 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QCircularProgress Vue 组件显示一个彩色的圆形进度条。工具条可以有一个确定的进度值，也可以有一个不确定的动画。它可以用于通知用户在后台正在进行某个操作。

item.title: 颜色选择器 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QColor Vue 组件提供了一种输入颜色的方式。

item.title: 对话框 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QDialog 组件提供了具有定位，样式化，最大化等功能的模态框。

item.title: 富文本编辑器 (WYSIWYG) | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QEditor Vue 组件是一个 WYSIWYG 编辑器，可以将编辑的内容转化成 HTML。

item.title: 扩展项/手风琴 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QExpansionItem 组件可以隐藏与用户不直接相关的内容。可以把它们想象成手风琴一样，当点击它们时，它们就会展开，这也被称为可折叠面板。

item.title: 悬浮操作按钮 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: 使用 QFab 为来您的 Quasar 引用添加悬浮的操作按钮。

item.title: 输入框 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QInput Vue 组件用于收集用户输入的文本或数字。

item.title: 选择框 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QSelect Vue component has two types of selection - single or multiple. This component opens up a menu for the selection list and action. A filter can also be used for longer lists.

item.title: 文件选择器 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QFile是一个处理用户交互以选取文件的Vue 组件。

item.title: 表单 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QForm Vue 组件渲染一个表单元素，并提供简单的表单验证方式

item.title: Field | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QField Vue component is used to provide common functionality and aspect to form components.

item.title: 单选框 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QRadio Vue 组件是采集用户输入的一个基本元素。您可以使用它为用户提供一种从多个选项中选择选项的方法。

item.title: 复选框 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QCheckbox是一个Vue复选框组件，带有着色，涟漪特效等特性。

item.title: Toggle | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QToggle Vue 组件是采集用户输入的一个基本元素。您可以使用它为用户提供设置开关切换或者真假值输入功能。

item.title: Button Toggle | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QBtnToggle Vue 组件也是一个基础的交互组件，有点相似于 QRadio，但是它是基于按钮的。

item.title: 选项组 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QOptionGroup Vue component allows you better control for grouping binary form input components like checkboxes, radios or toggles.

item.title: 滑块 | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QSlider 是用户指定最小值和最大值之间的数值的好方法。

item.title: Range | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QRange Vue component offers a way for the user to select from a sub-range of values between a maximum and maximum value, with optional steps.

item.title: QTime | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QTime 组件提供了输入时间的方法。

item.title: QDate | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: QDate 组件提供了一种输入日期的方法。目前它支持公历（默认）和波斯历。

item.title: Icon | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QIcon Vue component allows you to insert icons within other components or any other area of your pages.

item.title: QImg | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QImg Vue component makes working with responsive images easy and also adds a nice loading effect to them along with many other features like custom aspect ratio and captions.

item.title: Infinite Scroll | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QInfiniteScroll Vue component allows you to load new content as the user scrolls the page.

item.title: Inner Loading | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QInnerLoading Vue component allows you to add a loading indicator within a component in the form of a local overlay.

item.title: Intersection | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QIntersection vue component, a wrapper over Quasar's Intersection directive.

item.title: Knob | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QKnob Vue component is used to take a number input through mouse or touch panning.

item.title: Linear Progress | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QLinearProgress Vue component displays a colored loading bar. The bar can either have a determinate progress or an indeterminate animation.

item.title: List and List Items | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: How to use the QList, QItem, QItemSection and QItemLabel Vue components.

item.title: Markup Table | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QMarkupTable Vue component is a helper wrapper which styles a native table.

item.title: QMenu | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QMenu Vue component is a convenient way to show menus.

item.title: No SSR | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QNoSsr Vue component makes it easy to differentiate content between server-side and client-side.

item.title: Resize Observer (for Element) | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QResizeObserver Vue component emits a 'resize' event whenever the wrapping DOM element changes its width or height.

item.title: Scroll Observer | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QScrollObserver Vue component emits an event whenever the user scrolls the page or the parent scrollable container.

item.title: Pagination | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QPagination Vue component allows you to easily display a pagination control on a page.

item.title: Parallax | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QParallax Vue component makes it easy to embed a parallax scrolling effect into a page.

item.title: Popup Edit | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QPopupEdit Vue component can be used to edit a value 'in place', like for example on a cell in QTable.

item.title: Popup Proxy | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QPopupProxy is a Vue component that should be used when you need either a QMenu or a QDialog (on smaller screens) to be displayed.

item.title: Pull to refresh | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QPullToRefresh Vue component allows the user to pull down in order to refresh or retrieve the newest content on a page.

item.title: Rating | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QRating Vue component allows the user to rate items. It's usually known as 'star rating'.

item.title: Responsive | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QResponsive Vue component forces the content to maintain an aspect ratio based on its width.

item.title: Scroll Area | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QScrollArea Vue component offers a way of customizing the scrollbars for all desktop browsers.

item.title: Separator | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QSeparator Vue component is used to separate sections of text or other components or elements. It creates a colored line across the width of the parent. It can be horizontal or vertical.

item.title: Skeleton | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QSkeleton Vue component is used to display a placeholder preview of your content before you load the actual page data.

item.title: Slide Item | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QSlideItem Vue component is essentially a QItem with two additional slots (left and right) which allows the user to drag it to one of the sides in order to apply a specific action.

item.title: Slide Transition | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QSlideTransition Vue component slides the encapsulated element up or down, based on its visibility. Works alongside v-show and v-if.

item.title: QSpace | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QSpace Vue component fills all the available space inside of a flexbox DOM element.

item.title: Spinners | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QSpinner and its derived Vue components are used to show the user a timely process is currently taking place. It gives the user the feeling the system is continuing to work for longer term activities.

item.title: QSplitter | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QSplitter Vue component allow containers to be split vertically and/or horizontally through a draggable separator bar.

item.title: Stepper | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QStepper Vue component conveys progress through a sequence of numbered steps. It may also be used for navigation. It's usually useful when the user has to follow steps to complete a process, like in a wizard.

item.title: Table | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QTable Vue component allows you to display data in a tabular manner and it's packed with a lot of related features. It's generally called a datatable.

item.title: Tabs | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QTabs, QTab and QRouteTab Vue components are a way of helping the user navigate between pages or tab panels.

item.title: Tab Panels | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QTabPanel Vue component is a way of displaying more information using less window real estate.

item.title: Timeline | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QTimeline Vue component displays a list of events in chronological order. It is typically a graphic design showing a long bar labelled with dates alongside itself and usually events.

item.title: Toolbar | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QToolbar and QToolbarTitle Vue components are usually part of QHeader or QFooter, but it can be used anywhere on the page.

item.title: Tooltip | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QTooltip Vue component is to be used when you want to offer the user more information about a certain area in your App. When hovering the mouse over the target element (or briefly touching and holding on mobile platforms), the tooltip will appear.

item.title: Tree | Quasar V2 中文文档
item.author: null
item.description: The QTree is a highly configurable Vue component which displays hierarchical data, such as a table of contents in a tree structure.

item.title: Uploader | Quasar V2 中文文档
